sentences.en: A mule is a sterile animal.
sentences.cn: 骡子是不能生育的动物.

sentences.en: All diploid species are hemaphroditic and either self - fertile or self - sterile.
sentences.cn: 所有的两倍体种都是两性的,而且不是白花能稔,就是自花不稔.

sentences.en: An operating theatre should be a sterile environment.
sentences.cn: 手术室应该是个无菌的环境.

sentences.en: He always made sure that any cuts were protected by sterile dressings.
sentences.cn: 他总是坚持要用无菌纱布包扎伤口。

sentences.en: He had learnt early in his marriage that he was sterile.
sentences.cn: 他结婚不久便得知他不能生育.

sentences.en: Male workers were made permanently sterile by this pesticide.
sentences.cn: 这种杀虫剂使得男性工人终生不育.

sentences.en: One - sided and introspective mathematical speculation leads into sterile fields.
sentences.cn: 片面 的、内省的数学思索把人们引向不毛之地.

sentences.en: The classrooms are sterile, with no artwork on the walls.
sentences.cn: 这些教室毫无生气，墙上一张画都没有。

sentences.en: The doctor kept his instruments sterile.
sentences.cn: 这位医生的器具是消过毒的.

sentences.en: The farmers turned the sterile land into high fields.
sentences.cn: 农民们把不毛之地变成了高产田.

sentences.en: The rooting medium should be moist, well aerated, and sterile.
sentences.cn: 生根的基质应当是湿润, 透气良好和消过毒的.

sentences.en: The theistic God is almost as sterile a principle.
sentences.cn: 有神论的上帝也是与这种观念差不多同样贫乏的一种原理.

sentences.en: Their relationship had grown sterile over the years.
sentences.cn: 随着岁月的流逝,他们的关系变得了无生气.

sentences.en: This top fits over the bottle and keeps the teat sterile.
sentences.cn: 这个盖子严实地盖在奶瓶上,保持奶嘴无菌.

sentences.en: We simply removed from the cracked endocarp with sterile tweezers.
sentences.cn: 我们简单地用消过毒的镊子从裂开的内果皮中取出种子.

words.tran_cn: [泌尿] 不育；[妇产] 不孕；无菌；不毛；内容贫乏
消毒，[医][食品] 杀菌；使不孕；无用状态
消毒器；消毒者；[医] 杀菌器
杀菌；消除；冻结（sterilize的过去分词）
消毒，杀菌；使成不毛；使绝育；使不起作用
不育的；无菌的；贫瘠的；不毛的；枯燥乏味的

trans.tran_cn: 不毛的，贫瘠的，不生育的，无菌的，无效果的
trans.tran_en: a person or animal that is sterile cannot produce babies
